:Feline::

She knew that now she had what she needed.  Once HotRod was out and 
Cybershark was ready, she wold take them back to the Allience base 
and hand them over to Zardus.  She smiled, feeling pleased with 
herself.  She had outdone her own expectations of her mission.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "I like it. But I have to do something to complete it." He 
reprogramed
> the CR, to repaint him. He got in.
> "I need a new paint job." He shut the hatch. It wouldn't take long.
